text: The GIGN ( ; ) is the police tactical unit of the French National Gendarmerie. They deal with counterterrorism, hostage rescue, and surveillance of national threats, protecting government officials, protecting important sites, and targeting organized crime. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * GIGN page on the Gendarmerie Nationale's Official webpage * GIGN, 40 ans d'assauts (French documentary) Category:1970s establishments in France
title: GIGN
